dict.string: connection to the results server could not be made. please make sure that you have internet connectivity and try again later.
connection to the news server could not be made. please make sure that you have internet connectivity and try again later.
to compete with your friends you will need to be signed in to Google Play Services. please go to options menu and tap login button.
are you sure you want to purchase %s?
there was a problem connecting to the store. please make sure that you have internet connectivity and try again later.
